name: Drawn Up
description:
My Submission for Godot Wild Jam 53 - ASSEMBLY REQUIRED

https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-53

I had a lot more ideas for this project that never made it in.

  • Moving Platforms
  • Wires and Switches
  • More Levels lol
  • Physics Puzzles (Ramps and Balls)
  • 2D to 3D interactions
  • Player Graffiti 

I'm almost certain I would have reached most of my goals too if not for work. Next time I'll have to request time off or scale down my goals better for the amount of time I have. All-nighters aren't an option either since I currently work driving a vehicle, and risking the lives of others for a Game-Jam just doesn't sit right.

Either way, this was fun! I decided to do it on a whim and really needed the break from my current project Card Combo. It was exhilarating jumping into a fresh project and just rocking out some tasks.

The Project File I uploaded is mostly intended for Educational dissection, however if anyone wants to rehash into their own Project go for it I guess, just email me about it! I would love to see how it helps or what it turns into! thelettucepie@gmail.com
